title: January 6 and the future of bipartisanship, Covid-19 origins and 15 percent
description: Barbara Comstock and Rep. Jason Crow (D-Colo.) discuss the failure to form a bipartisan Jan. 6 commission. Matthew Pottinger and Dr. Peter Hotez explain why the Covid-19 lab leak theory is gaining legitimacy from the Biden administration. Carrie Dann looks at latest polling which shows that a rising number of Americans believe in QAnon.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
